name: pumpportal-ws-analyze
description: PumpPortal WebSocket analyzer that monitors new tokens and detects when creators sell their tokens

scripts.optimize:ultra: BACKTEST_OPTIMIZE=true BACKTEST_TP_RANGE=5,10,15,20,25 BACKTEST_SL_RANGE=25,30,35,40,45,50 BACKTEST_BATCH_SIZE=10 BACKTEST_MAX_PARALLEL=5 BACKTEST_SMART_SAMPLING=false BACKTEST_EXTRA_SOL_ENTRY=0.001074 BACKTEST_EXTRA_SOL_EXIT=0.001029 node scripts/analysis/backtest/wallet-backtest-all.js
scripts.clean:logs: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path');const clean=(dir)=>{if(!fs.existsSync(dir))return;const stat=fs.statSync(dir);if(stat.isFile()&&dir.endsWith('.log')){fs.unlinkSync(dir);console.log('🗑️  Deleted file:',dir);}else if(stat.isDirectory()){try{const items=fs.readdirSync(dir);for(const item of items){clean(path.join(dir,item));}const remaining=fs.existsSync(dir)?fs.readdirSync(dir):[];if(remaining.length===0){fs.rmdirSync(dir);console.log('📁 Deleted directory:',dir);}}catch(e){console.warn('⚠️  Could not process:',dir,e.message);}}};console.log('🧹 Starting log cleanup...');['logs','tracking'].forEach(clean);console.log('✅ Log cleanup completed!');"
scripts.clean:logs:safe: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path');let count=0;const scan=(dir)=>{if(!fs.existsSync(dir))return;const stat=fs.statSync(dir);if(stat.isFile()&&dir.endsWith('.log')){count++;}else if(stat.isDirectory()){try{fs.readdirSync(dir).forEach(item=>scan(path.join(dir,item)));}catch{}}};['logs','tracking'].forEach(scan);console.log(`Found ${count} .log files that would be deleted. Run 'npm run clean:logs' to delete them.`);"
